name: Risek Capsule
description: Risek Capsule is used to treat acid-related stomach issues such as heartburn, GERD, and ulcers by reducing acid production.

name: Brufen
description: Brufen is a pain reliever and anti-inflammatory medicine commonly used for headaches, muscle pain, and arthritis.

name: Hydrylin
description: Hydrylin is a cough syrup used for relieving symptoms of cold, flu, and allergy such as sneezing, runny nose, and throat irritation.

name: Panadol
description: Panadol is a widely used over-the-counter medication for pain relief and fever reduction. It is effective for headaches, toothaches, and flu symptoms.

name: Frock
description: Stylish frock for women, perfect for formal and casual occasions with a comfortable and elegant design.

name: Herbal Face Wash
description: Gentle and natural face wash enriched with neem and aloe vera to cleanse and refresh your skin.

name: Organic Shampoo
description: Sulphate-free shampoo that strengthens hair and promotes healthy scalp with natural ingredients.

name: Body Lotion
description: Moisturizing body lotion with shea butter and vitamin E for soft, nourished skin all day long.

name: Sunscreen SPF 50
description: Broad-spectrum sunscreen with SPF 50 that protects against UVA and UVB rays without greasiness.

name: Essential Oils Set
description: Set of 6 pure essential oils for aromatherapy, massage, and natural skin care routines.

name: Electric Facial Cleanser
description: Rechargeable facial cleansing brush for deep pore cleaning, exfoliation, and smooth skin.

name: Hair Dryer
description: Compact and powerful hair dryer with multiple heat settings and cool shot for professional styling.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: Brightening serum with vitamin C and hyaluronic acid for radiant, youthful skin.
